description: Michele Rizzo is the owner-chef of this interesting restaurant situated in a modern part of Rende. His menu focuses mainly on fish (although a few meat dishes are also available) which he prepares in light, modern dishes with an emphasis on local ingredients. There’s also an interesting wine list.
